sentences: Web Developer / Software Engineer (JavaScript React) London / WFH to £85k
Are you a Web Developer with a good grounding in Computer Science combined with strong Vanilla JavaScript, TypeScript and React skills?
You could be progressing your career in a senior, hands-on role at a FinTech solutions as they expand their UK presence

As a Web Developer you will design front end software architectures, prototyping and iterating new user interfaces; you'll collaborate with UX designers to define user flow specification and liaise with internal stakeholders to define requirements, building out enterprise level UI systems
You'll be working with cutting edge technologies, with a focus on React (including React Hooks, Redux), to build SPAs with a keen eye for detail and user experience
WFH Policy:
There's a remote interview / onboarding process, with 2 days work from home per week, with the rest of your time in modern, open plan City based offices with a range of facilities
Requirements:
You have strong Vanilla JavaScript and TypeScript skills
You have strong React experience and are accomplished with HTML5, CSS
You have a good understanding of REST APIs and web integration with backend systems
You have a good understanding of Comp Sci fundamentals such as OOP, Design Patterns, Data Structures, Algorithms
You're familiar with AWS
You're collaborative with good communication skills, keen to learn and share ideas
You're degree educated, 2
1 or above gained in Computer Science or similar technical / scientific / numerate discipline
What's in it for you:
As a Web Developer you will earn a competitive salary (to £85k) plus bonus and benefits including:
Enhanced annual leave
Private medical care
Pension
Enhanced maternity and paternity packages
Time off for volunteering as well as other charity events
Summer and Christmas parties
Professional development and support
Perks such as cycle to work scheme
Apply now to find out more about this Web Developer / Software Engineer (JavaScript React) opportunity
At Client Server we believe in a diverse workplace that allows people to play to their strengths and continually learn

We're an equal opportunities employer whose people come from all walks of life and will never discriminate based on race, colour, religion, sex, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status
The clients we work with share our values
